Package de.feu.massim22.group3.map

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
de.feu.massim22.group3.map.GameMap
public class GameMap extends Object
The Class GameMap stores a two dimensional array of MapCells which map the state of the discovered game map to an internal data structure which is the base for path finding.
Author:
Heinz Stadler, Melinda Betz (minor contribution)
See Also:
  • GameMap

  • Constructor Details

    • GameMap

      public GameMap(int x, int y, String team)
      Instantiates a new GameMap.
      Parameters:
      x - the initial size of the map in horizontal direction
      y - the initial size of the map in vertical direction
      team - the name of the team the agent is part of

  • Method Details

    • getGoalCache

      List<Point> getGoalCache()
      Gets the currently discovered goal points. The points are measured in the internal coordinate system of the GameMap.
      Returns:
      a List of type Point of the internal goal points

    • getRoleCache

      List<Point> getRoleCache()
      Gets the currently discovered role points. The points are measured in the internal coordinate system of the GameMap.
      Returns:
      a List of type Point of the internal role points

    • mapDiscovered

      public boolean mapDiscovered()
      Returns if the map size is discovered yet.
      Returns:
      true if the map size is discovered

    • getAgentPosition

      public Point getAgentPosition(String name)
      Gets the position of the agent with the provided name. The position is measured in the coordinate system of the agent.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the agent
      Returns:
      the position of the agent in the coordinate system of the agent

    • getInternalAgentPosition

      Point getInternalAgentPosition(String agent)
      Gets the position of the agent with the provided name. The position is measured in the internal coordinate system of the GameMap with 0/0 at the top left of the map.
      Parameters:
      agent - the name of the agent
      Returns:
      the position of the agent in the coordinate system of the agent

    • getAgentIdAtPoint

      public int getAgentIdAtPoint(Point p)
      Gets the index of the agent at a certain point.
      Parameters:
      p - the position of the agent in the coordinate system of the agent.
      Returns:
      the index of the agent if there is an agent at the provided position or 0

    • isBlockAttached

      public boolean isBlockAttached(Point p)
      Calculates if a block at the provided position is attached to a known agent of the map.
      Parameters:
      p - the position of the block in the coordinate system of the agent
      Returns:
      true if there is a block at the provided position which is attached to a known agent

    • attachedAtRelativePoint

      boolean attachedAtRelativePoint(Point p, int value)
      Calculates if the relative Position to an agent is contained in the attached code. The attached code encodes connected Points in a single integer.
      Parameters:
      p - the position relative to an agent
      value - the attached code of the agent
      Returns:
      true if the agent with tha attached code has an attachment at the provided relative position

    • getInternalCellIndex

      public Point getInternalCellIndex(int x, int y)
      Translates a Point in the coordinate system of the agent into the internal coordinate system of the map.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal value of the Point
      y - the vertical value of the Point
      Returns:
      a Point in the internal coordinate system of the map which reflects the provided coordinates in the coordinate system of the agent

    • getDebugCells

      CellType[][] getDebugCells()
      Creates a copy of the internal Array of CellTypes for the GraphicalDebugger
      Returns:
      a two-dimensional Array of type CellType
      See Also:
      • GraphicalDebugger

    • addReport

      public void addReport(int x, int y, CellType cellType, ZoneType zoneType, int agentId, int step)
      Adds information of the current vision of an agent to the map.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal value of the Point in the vision of the agent (in the coordinate system of the agent)
      y - the vertical value of the Point in the vision of the agent (in the coordinate system of the agent)
      cellType - the type of the element which is discovered
      zoneType - the type of the zone which is discovered
      agentId - the index of the agent which sends the report
      step - the step in which the agent sends the report

    • setAgentPosition

      public void setAgentPosition(String name, Point position)
      Stores the position of an agent in a internal map.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the agent
      position - the position of the agent in the coordinate system of the agent

    • getMeetingPoints

      public List<Point> getMeetingPoints()
      Gets a List of Points in goal zones which have enough free space around to comfortably assemble blocks.
      Returns:
      the List of Points

    • setAgentAttached

      public void setAgentAttached(String name, List<Point> attachedThings)
      Encodes a List of attached Points of an agent into an Integer and stores the value in an internal map.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the agent
      attachedThings - the attached things of the agent

    • getAgentAttached

      public int getAgentAttached(String agent)
      Gets the information of attached points of an agent encoded in an Integer.
      Parameters:
      agent - the name of the agent
      Returns:
      the information of attached points of the agent encoded in an Integer

    • getAgentAttachedDistance

      public int getAgentAttachedDistance(String agent)
      Gets the maximum distance of all attached things of an agent.
      Parameters:
      agent - the name of the agent
      Returns:
      the maximum distance of all attached things

    • getTopLeft

      public Point getTopLeft()
      Gets the position in the coordinate system of the agents which reflects the position 0/0 in the internal coordinate system of the map.
      Returns:
      the position at the top left of the map in the coordinate system of the agent

    • getDebugAgentPosition

      Map<Point,String> getDebugAgentPosition()
      Gets a Map with all agent positions relative to the internal coordinate system of the map. The key of the map is the agent name, the value is the agent position.
      Returns:
      the Map with all agent positions relative to the internal coordinate system of the map

    • getBottomRight

      public Point getBottomRight()
      Gets the position in the coordinate system of the agents which reflects the bottom right point in the internal coordinate system of the map.
      Returns:
      the position at the bottom right of the map in the coordinate system of the agent

    • setFinalSize

      public void setFinalSize(int x, int y)
      Sets the size of the GameMap after the size is discovered by the agents.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal size of the map
      y - the vertical size of the map

    • mergeIntoMap

      public Point mergeIntoMap(GameMap foreignMap, Point foreignPoint, Point thisPoint)
      Merges a GameMap into this GameMap. The information of the foreign map will be integrated into this map. The provided points must reflect the same point in the real map.
      Parameters:
      foreignMap - the map which should be merged
      foreignPoint - a point in the foreign map which acts as a reference point
      thisPoint - a point in this map which acts as a reference point
      Returns:
      the offset the foreign map to this map

    • getCellType

      CellType getCellType(int x, int y)
      Gets the CellType of a cell int the GameMap in the coordinate system of the agents.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of the cell
      y - the vertical position of the cell
      Returns:
      the CellType of the cell

    • getMapBuffer

      public FloatBuffer getMapBuffer()
      Gets a FloatBuffer which encodes the Cells of the GameMap. Obstacles or undiscovered cells are encoded as 1f, other types are encoded as 0f.
      Returns:
      the FloatBuffer which encodes the Cells of the GameMap

    • getDirectionToNearestUndiscoveredPoint

      String getDirectionToNearestUndiscoveredPoint(String agent, String lastMoveDirection)
      Gets the direction to the nearest undiscovered Point relative to an agent in this map.
      Parameters:
      agent - the agent from which to calculate
      lastMoveDirection - the direction of the last move
      Returns:
      the direction ("n", "e", "s", "w") to the nearest undiscovered Point

    • getInterestingPoints

      public List<InterestingPoint> getInterestingPoints(int maxCount, boolean useRoleZones)
      Gets a List which contains information about Dispensers, GoalZones and RoleZones.
      Parameters:
      maxCount - the maximum number of InterestingPoints which should be returned
      useRoleZones - if true, RoleZones will be added to the list
      Returns:
      a List of Interesting Points from this GameMap

    • getMapSize

      public Point getMapSize()
      Gets the current map size
      Returns:
      the map size

    • getEmptyBuffer

      public FloatBuffer getEmptyBuffer()
      Gets a with zeros initialized FloatBuffer. The size of the Buffer is according to the number of cells in the GameMap.
      Returns:
      a with zeros initialized FloatBuffer

    • isAgentInGroupAtPosition

      boolean isAgentInGroupAtPosition(Point p)
      Tests if any known agent in the team is at a certain position.
      Parameters:
      p - the position in the coordinate system of the agents
      Returns:
      true if there is a known agent at the provided position
